column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////After reading such great reviews
column2: I had high hopes for this place. Unfortunately
column3: I was left wanting more. The ambiance is fun and the service is pretty good
column4: but the food was mediocre at best. The portobello mushroom fries appetizer was pretty good
column5: as were the cornbread madeleines and the seasonal lemonade (prickly pear when I went). However
column6: the mushroom quinoa burger was salty and
column8: way too overpriced. Probably won't return here.
